Context:
* To apply for an audition at George Brown College Dance Program, submit your application through Ontario Colleges Application Service.
* Applications must be accepted by George Brown College before an audition date is given.
* Entrance into all George Brown Dance programs is by audition only and currently only accepting video submissions due to COVID-19.
* Each audition costs $60 CAD in advance.
* For further information about audition requirements or dance program inquiries, contact dance@georgebrown.ca.
* George Brown College Dance Program contact number: 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559)
* Sign up for updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours and more at ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
* Website disclaimer: Information is subject to change without notice and students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
